scripts.migrate: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config ./dist/config/config.js --migrations-path=./dist/migrations
scripts.migrate-undo: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config ./dist/config/config.js --migrations-path=./dist/migrations
scripts.seed: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config ./dist/config/config.js --seeders-path=./dist/seeders
